channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:08 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:08 Alarm lifted in Cherkasy region. Follow further messages. #Cherkasy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 08:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 08:19 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 07:56 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow further reports.
item.description: 游릭 07:56 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. item.title: 游릭 07:37 Alarm response in Sumy region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 游리 07:19 Repulse of alarm in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kup'yanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 07:19 Repulse of alarm in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kup'yanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#햔햟햨혰쒬혧햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 07:12 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Follow the news for further updates.
